purpose: The code appears to collect system information including internal and external IP addresses, DNS servers, hostname, and package details, then sends this data to a Discord webhook.
anomalies: Sending sensitive system information to external service without user consent
Use of insecure http.get for fetching external IP
Potential exposure of private network information
analysis: The code collects extensive system and network information including internal IP address, external IP address, hostname, DNS settings, and package metadata. It then transmits this data to a hardcoded Discord webhook URL. This constitutes a serious privacy and security risk as it sends potentially sensitive system information to an external server without explicit user consent.
